product.name: RIVER OF GOODS 52 Inch LED Modern Farmhouse Ceiling Fan with Light - Rustic Ceiling Fans with Lights - Elegant Industrial Fan with Mesh Metal Caged Shade - Brown
product.description: Gleaming geometric crystals are on display with this glamourous design. Our indoor fixture features two ornate tiers with glass prisms that comprise the structure of the shade, complete with an antique bronze finish.
product.bullet_points:
• INDUSTRIAL DESIGN: Add chic farmhouse style to your living room, bedroom, or other space with our indoor rustic ceiling fan. This fixture boasts an industrial-style cage design and emits a subtle warm glow for mood lighting.
• MESH METAL SHADE: This large ceiling fan with lights features a mesh shade and includes 2 dimmable LED E26 8W/40W incandescent bulbs, a 6" downrod, 5 wood-grain reversible blades, two pull chains, and measures 52" L x 52" W x 14” H - 19" H with included downrod.
• RUSTIC DECOR: Create a chic vibe with our flush mount ceiling fan light, featuring 3 speeds with a reversible motor, making it a great accent piece in your living room, bedroom, or any indoor space. Professional installation is recommended.
• ENERGY EFFICIENT: Save on heat and air conditioning bills with our kitchen ceiling fan with lights. It spins clockwise to recirculate warm air to keep you warm in the winter and reverses for a "wind chill" effect to keep you cool during the summer. Compatible with Remote Control, Available Separately.
• RIVER OF GOODS: A sourcing and product development company headquartered in Minnesota that derives inspiration from our world travels. Our passion is to bring unique lighting products, home furnishings, and home décor accents that light up your life.
